Package index

All functions

cropland_nj_2015
Cropland data for the state of New Jersey.
cropland_world_2015_era5
Global cropland weights
era5_grid
Empty ERA5 grid.
overlay_weights()
Find the spatial overlap between a raster and a set of polygons
overlay_weights_nj
Area and cropland weights in ERA5 grid for New Jersey counties
pop_world_2015_era5
Global population weights
secondary_weights()
Resample a raster of secondary weights
staggregate_bin()
Bin transformation and aggregation of climate data
staggregate_degree_days()
Degree days transformation and aggregation of climate data
staggregate_polynomial()
Polynomial transformation and aggregation of climate data
staggregate_spline()
Restricted cubic spline transformation and aggregation of climate data
temp_nj_jun_2024_era5
Temperature data for New Jersey in June
